New Records: De Kock hits sublime 174 off 140 balls - highest score in tournament
Key Match Events: South Africa post imposing 382-5 after late flurry
Mahmudullah makes excellent 111 off as many balls to defy South Africa
Lizaad Williams wraps up the innings as Mistafizur sends one up in the air and David Miller settles under it to take the catch
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa captain Aiden Markram: 'It was another good day. Tough to grind it out at the end, but we thought sticking to what we believe in would take 10 wickets.'
Bangladesh captain Shakib Al Hasan: 'We conceded 144 from last 10 overs, which is probably the most expensive 10 overs we've bowled in the last 10-15 years.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa are now well-placed to reach the semi-finals.
Bangladesh now face a tough challenge to reach the final four but aren't mathematically out of it yet.
South Africa have now posted the three highest scores in the tournament.
This is how the table looks after that result.
Others: South Africa climb above New Zealand, into second behind India.
Bangladesh now are at the bottom of the table.
England are no longer bottom of the table.
